UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Rationally Modified Antimicrobial Peptides from the N-Terminal Domain of Human RNase 3 Show Exceptional Serum Stability.
Literature.Author: Sandín D, Valle J, Chaves-Arquero B, Prats-Ejarque G, Larrosa MN, González-López JJ, Jiménez MA, Boix E, Andreu D, Torrent M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:11±4% Hemolysis=250 µM,Human fibroblasts MRC-5:IC50=>300 µM
